text: "We Are Happy Women" is a song recorded by Japanese singer-songwriter Mai Kuraki, taken from her twelfth studio album Kimi Omou: Shunkashūtō (2018). It was released on March 2, 2018, by Northern Music and served as the campaign song for Happy Woman, an official project for protecting Japanese women's human rights.. == Live performance == On March 4, 2018, Kuraki performed "We Are Happy Women" in an event, Happy Woman Ceremony which was held at Yebisu Garden Place in Tokyo. ==Track listing== ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Chart (2018) ! scope="col" | Peak position |- |Japan (Billboard Japan Top Download Songs) |style="text- align:center;"|93 |- |Japan RecoChoku (RecoChoku Weekly Singles) |style="text- align:center;"|42 |- |Japan mora (mora Weekly Singles) |style="text- align:center;"|19 |- |Japan Dwango (Dwango Weekly Singles) |style="text- align:center;"|87 |- |Japan music.jp (music.jp Weekly Singles) |style="text- align:center;"|55 |- |} ==Release history== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Region ! scope="col"| Date ! scope="col"| Format ! scope="col"| Label ! scope="col"| Ref. |- |Japan |March 2, 2018 | Digital download |Northern Music | |- |} ==References== Category:2018 singles Category:2018 songs Category:Mai Kuraki songs Category:Songs written by Mai Kuraki Category:Songs written by Aika Ohno Category:Song recordings produced by Daiko Nagato
title: We Are Happy Women
